contentfulSermon.title: Jesus Vs. Religion:Week 2 - Brokenness vs Pride

fields.notesFormatted:
Results of pride:

  1. Honors self rather than God
  2. Looking down on others
  3. Drives people away from God's grace

Results of Brokenness:

  1. Connecting with God
  2. Embraces reality
  3. Leads to ultimate rescue
  4. Brings God honor
